out_file.description: Flask application serving the arXiv CS Daily webpage with routes for the homepage (supporting category and date filters) and paper detail pages.
List of required Python packages for the Flask web application and data fetching from arXiv.
Module for fetching and processing arXiv data with date filtering, now correctly handling date ranges for the arXiv API query format.
HTML template for the homepage, featuring domain-specific navigation, a calendar tool for date selection, and a list of papers filtered by category and date.
HTML template for the paper detail page, displaying comprehensive metadata, direct PDF access, and citation tools.
CSS stylesheet for the arXiv CS Daily webpage, providing a clean, responsive design including styles for the new date picker and navigation elements.
JavaScript file for client-side interactivity, including one-click copying of citations and automatic form submission for the date picker to enhance user experience.
